intro:
DIY CRISPR Super-Soldier Project Blog 

Email: KoscheiTheDeathless@protonmail.com

post.body:
Congratulations you made it.

Welcome to the future lads, this is the Blog for the development of a DIY CRISPR Gene therapy super soldier serum for my own personal usage that is Uncensored and method follow-able by all.  
I of course don't suggest any of you do this, ESPECIALLY after i have proven both its relative safety and effectiveness.
Just think how dangerous that would be to (((society))).

update for everyone, i plan on continuing my project, i have made progress so far i plan on growing a synthetic kidney like organ which will express many of the proteins, antibodies and hormones and secrete them into my blood passively,  then get this organ implanted in myself.

comment.body: @Kildraad: my pleasure someone has to take the first plunge

@Skeptical: what do you mean? the plan is synthesise the viral particles with crispr and grna construct with protease handcuffs then shoot up with a series of gene therapies over 12 weeks and post the results

@Thirtyeight: i think it will take me about 3 months worth of gene therapies to fully transform myself, and maybe 12 months until my body has fully changed. it will take me maybe 1 year to reach the point where im gonna start shooting up with gene therapies
@Kildraad: im going to be giving scientific in depth explanations for all procedures as well as accompanying literature
@Brundle: when ive made progress, this kind of thing isnt something you can just do in a fortnight or a month
